question: How many Rijksmonumenten (national heritage sites) are there in Leeuwarden, Netherlands?
asked_question_translated: Koliko Rijksmonumenten (spomenikov nacionalne dediščine) je v mestu Leeuwarden na Nizozemskem?
answer: V mestu Leeuwarden na Nizozemskem je približno 800 Rijksmonumenten.
answer_translated_eng: There are around 800 Rijksmonumenten in Leeuwarden in the Netherlands.
